subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Baseball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: After converting 42 of 46 save chances this season, Rafael Soriano, 32, opted out of his contract with the Yankees on Wednesday, and will seek more compensation in free agency.
snippet: After converting 42 of 46 save chances this season, Rafael Soriano, 32, opted out of his contract with the Yankees on Wednesday, and will seek more compensation in free agency.
